title: Weak Passwords and Compromised Accounts: Key Findings from the Blue Report 2025
description: As security professionals, it's easy to get caught up in a race to counter the latest advanced adversary techniques. Yet the most impactful attacks often aren't from cutting-edge exploits, but from cracked credentials and compromised accounts.
